title: Fortnite Content Manager
job_overview:
We're looking for a fortnite creator manager that will join our media team. Your main job will be to manage a team of content creators/recorders, editors, and thumbnail makers for videos that will be uploaded on youtube. You will be responsible for assigning weekly content tasks, managing them, recruiting, reviewing submitted works, giving feedback, and ensuring that everything is delivered on the deadline and on high quality. (You will not be the one who will upload them but only manage them ) You have to have knowlege about fortnite contents and you are either played it long enough or still playing atm.

Requirements

-Has played or still playing Fortnite

-Knowledgeable about Fortnite Contents.

-Experience managing creators or online projects (preferred but not required)

-Familiarity with YouTube/TikTok gaming content 

-Strong communication and organizational skills

-Ability to give constructive feedback and keep creators on task and on dedline

-Comfortable working with Google Drive, Upgrade to see actual info, and basic content tools

If you're interested text me on Upgrade to see actual info : fannyicu_18462 ( Send me a friend request)

payments are weekly by paypal
